label.export_para_1: You can share your location trail with anyone using the Share button below.  Once you press the button it will ask you with whom and how you want to share it.
label.export_para_2: Location is shared as a simple list of times and coordinates, no other identifying information.
label.import_step_1: 1. Login to your Google Account and Download your Location History
label.import_step_2: 2. After downloaded, open this screen again. The data will import automatically.
